data.actual_result: It does, But, the "No Text Channels" Screen appears
data.expected_result: The DM will close and the "Online" Friend List will appear
data.short_description: When closing a DM chat the app shows "No Text Channels" Screen for 2 or 3 seconds
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into any DM you have - Tap the three dots at right-top corner - Choose "Close"
